```{r styling, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Add some custom CSS styling to the cards
tags$style("
  
  .title {
    text-align: center;
    color: #1b4a9c;
    font-size: 30px; 
    margin-left: 30%; 
    margin-right: 30%;
  }
  
  h1 {
    text-align: center; 
    font-size: 24px; 
    color: #e9945b; 
    background-color: #1b4a9c;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  h2 {
    text-align: center; color: #e9945b; 
  }


  a {
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 22px;
  }

  button:hover, a:hover {
    opacity: 0.7;
  }
  
  /* Style the card container */
  .card_right_slide {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: ;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-top: 2px solid #1b4a9c;
    background: inherit;
  }
  
  .card_left_slide {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 0px;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: ;
    border-radius: 10px;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-top: 2px solid #1b4a9c;
    background: inherit;
  }

  /* Style the card header */
  .card-header {
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: inherit;
    text-align: center;
    font-family: ;
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: bold;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #1b4a9c;
    color: #e9945b; 
  }
  
  
  /* Style the card */
  .card {
    border-bottom: 2px solid #1b4a9c;
  }
  
 
  
  
  

  /* Style the card image */
  .card-image {
    width: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 10px;
    align: center;
  }

  /* Style the card text */
  .card-text {
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 22px;
    position: relative;
    background-color: inherit;
    opacity: 0.8;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  /* Style button*/
  button {
    outline: 0;
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 8px;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    max-width: 60%;
    font-size: 22px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: none;
    border-bottom: 2px solid #1b4a9c;
    margin-left: 20%;
    margin-right: 20%;
    text-color: grey90;
    background-color: inherit; 
  }
  
  /* Container holding the image and the text */
  .container {
    position: relative;
    text-align: center;
    color: inherit;
    object-fit: fill;
    max-width: 100%;
    max-height:auto;
    margin: auto;
  }

  /* Top left text */
  .top-left {
    position: absolute;
    max-top: 100px;
    max-left: 205px;
    max-right: 200px;
    min-bottom: 100px;
    color: grey90;
    font-size: 22px;
    background-color: inherit;
    opacity: 0.8;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  
")
```

::: {#Testimonials .column-page}
<h1 style="color:#e9945b; background-color:#1b4a9c;">

Testimonials

</h1>

```{r testimonials, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Render the slideshow
htmltools::browsable(
  tags$html(
    tags$head(
      # Use Bootstrap 5
      tags$link(
        rel = "stylesheet",
        href = "https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/5.0.0-alpha1/css/bootstrap.min.css"
      )
    ),
    
    tags$body(
      
      tags$div(
    id = "slideshow-testimonials_slide",
    class = "carousel slide",
    `data-bs-ride` = "carousel",
    tags$div(
      class = "carousel-inner",
      lapply(seq_along(testimonials_cards), function(i) {
        tags$div(
          class = ifelse(i == 1, "carousel-item active", "carousel-item"),
          `data-bs-interval` = 4000,
          card_left_slide(testimonials_cards[[i]])
        )
      })
    )
  ),
      # Add some custom CSS for the animations
      card_animation_slide()
    )
  )
)

```
